text: This is a list of diseases of foliage plants belonging to the family Agavaceae. ==Plant Species== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Plant species |- |C ||Cordyline sp. ||Ti plant |- |Ds ||D. sanderana ||Belgian Evergreen |- |S ||Sansevieria spp. ||mother-in-law-tongue |- |Y ||Yucca spp. ||soft tip yucca, Spanish-Bayonet |- |} ==Bacterial diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Bacterial diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Bacterial leaf spot ||Erwinia carotovora subsp. carotovora ||D, Ds |- |Bacterial leaf spot ||E. chrysanthemi ||D, Ds |- |Bacterial leaf spot ||E. herbicola ||Ds |- |Bacterial leaf spot ||Pseudomonas sp. ||Ds |- |Erwinia blight ||Erwinia carotovora subsp. carotovora ||C, D, S |- |Erwinia blight ||E. chrysanthemi ||C, D, S |- |} ==Fungal diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=2| Fungal diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Anthracnose || Glomerella cingulata Colletotrichum gloeosporioides [anamorph] ||C, D |- |Brown leaf spot || Paraphaeosphaeria obtusispora Leptosphaeria obtusispora Coniothyrium henriquesii [anamorph] ||Y |- |Fusarium leaf spot || Fusarium moniliforme Gibberella fujikuroi [teleomorph] ||D |- |Gray leaf spot ||Cytosporina sp. ||Y |- |Gray mold ||Botrytis cinerea ||D, Ds, Sa |- |Phyllosticta leaf spot || Phyllosticta spp. Phyllosticta draconi ||C, Ds |- |Phytophthora stem rot || Phytophthora nicotianae var. parasitica Phytophthora parasitica ||C, D |- |Red leaf spot ||Fusarium moniliforme ||S |- |Southern blight ||Sclerotium rolfsii ||all |- |Stem rot ||Aspergillus niger ||Ds, S |- |} ==Nematodes, parasitic== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=2| Nematodes, parasitic |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Lesion ||Pratylenchus spp. ||C, D |- ||Root-knot ||Meloidogyne incognita ||S |- |} ==References== *Common Names of Diseases, The American Phytopathological Society Foliage plant (Agavaceae)
title: List of foliage plant diseases (Agavaceae)
